import React from "react" import Signup from "./views/Signup" import { AuthProvider } from "./hooks/AuthContext.js" import { BrowserRouter as HashRouter, Switch, Route } from "react-router-dom" import Login from "./views/Login" import ForgotPassword from "./views/ForgotPassword" import UpdateProfile from "./views/UpdateProfile" import Game from "./views/Game" import MyCollection from "./views/MyCollection" import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import PrivateRoute from "./components/general/PrivateRoute" const App = () => { return (
) } export default App;
